content: *crocheted baby blanket with a delicate lace edging yarnspirations * materials bernat baby sport 350 g/12 3 oz 1148 m/1256 yds 1 ball baby yellow 21615 *note model photo shown in bernat softee baby but had the same finished size pattern now specifies bernat baby sport * size 4 mm u s g/6 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge 5 yds \ 4 5 m of ⅜ inch \ 9 mm wide ribbon pattern 6-row repeat finish with 4-round lace edging weave ribbon through eyelet round of lace border english pdf modified june 7 2010 lace border blanket to crochet 1 french pdf modified april 6 2010 couverture à bordure de dentelle au crochet 2 available at joann com crochet lace border blanket 3 1 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_babysport005_cr_blanket en_us pdf 2 http //www yarnspirations com/assets/files/pattern-files/pdf/bernat_babysport005_cr_blanket fr_ca pdf 3 http //www joann com/crochet-lace-border-blanket/p138474 html
